decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings titled:

Application form; Location & site plans; Existing front elevation (Drawing number: 2118-P/EX/01); Existing rear elevation (Drawing number: 2118-P/EX/03); Existing side elevation (Drawing number: 2118-P/EX/02); Cross section details of new window assemblies GW5 to 7, FW1 to 5 & FW7 (Drawing number: 2118-P/DL-W/02); Cross section details of new window assemblies GW1 to 4, FW6 (Drawing number: 2118-P/DL-W/01); Window Schedule First floor (Drawing number: 2118-P/W-S/F1); Window & external door schedule Ground floor (Drawing number: 2118-P/W+ED-S/G1); Proposed rear elevation (Drawing number: 2118-P/P/03); Proposed side elevation (Drawing number: 2118-P/P/02); Proposed front elevation (Drawing number: 2118-P/P/01);
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies HC1, D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
